dict.acceptation: 舒适的；安逸的，处于轻松的；充裕的；

sent.orig: Comfortable ground comfortable tree can develop arboreous zoology benefit and economic benefits adequately.
sent.trans: 适地适树可充分发挥树木的生态效益和经济效益。

sent.orig: Comfortable ZHANG YA means heart at comfortable piece, the side pressure of the afferent wall.
sent.trans: 舒张压是指心脏在舒张时，血管壁上的侧压力。

sent.orig: If not comfortable enough, you can return and change itthe one that is more comfortable.
sent.trans: 如果不放心的话，你可以返回并改变了一个更舒适了。

sent.orig: I don't think those boys are comfortable talking in front of a priest.
sent.trans: 我想那些小孩不习惯在牧师面前说话。

sent.orig: Therefore, first aid is more than the physical attention dressing his injuries or making him comfortable.
sent.trans: 因此，急救比医生的救护更能使受害者的伤害得到抚慰或让他们感到舒适。
